title: my new google pixel xl keeps freezing and i turn it off and it keeps freezing when it turns back on
content:
my new google pixel xl keeps freezing and when i restart the phone it is still frozen, sometimes it says i have no sim or no service, when i do and sometimes it looks normal but the screen just doesn't work. 
this is really annoying because the reason i bought this new phone was because my old phone would freeze too. please help me. i would call the google helpline but i cant because my phone doesn't work.
